thread.title: Inside the Wadi Mujib Canyon, Jordan
thread.title_full: Inside the Wadi Mujib Canyon, Jordan

author: Gary
title: Inside the Wadi Mujib Canyon, Jordan
text:
Inside the Wadi Mujib Canyon, Jordan 
Camera NIKON D300S Aperture f/5 Exposure Time 1/40 
During my last trip to Jordan I had the experience of canyoning up the Wadi Mujib. It wasnâ€™t an easy experience. The river is rough and there are several waterfalls you have to climb up. In fact, I lost my glasses during the trip as they were blown off my face going down a waterfall. 
I should also add that this all took place below sea level. Wadi Mujib is near the Dead Sea, which makes it one of the lowest elevation rivers in the world. Get My FREE 100 Page Travel Photography eBook!
